archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.3.9e: e) organising duties in such a way as to minimise the risk of theft, fraud, error and unauthorised changes to information (e.g. by supervising activities, prohibiting lone working and segregating duties).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
